name: Baldi's Basics Version 1.2.2, But Something is... a Bit Different
name_original: Baldi's Basics Version 1.2.2, But Something is... a Bit Different
description:
Welcome to Baldi's Basics V1.2.2 But Something is... a Bit Different

It's supposed to be a small decompile I worked on because I needed something to upload that's not Banickate's Basics. This decompile includes:

  • 1 New Subject
  • 1 New Character
  • A Different Map Layout
  • Playtime can FINALLY SHUT UP, but she has her music box now
  • Different Posters
Current Challenge:

The new character, although it works on a test scene, does not work during normal play, so the current challenge is:

Go to the Assembly-CSharp file using dnSpy, then find the issue with the new character, and then FIX the issue, then send it to me via Discord DM or GameBanana PM!

Can I Mod This?

Yes! Sure thing! Just worry about 2 things:

  1. Crediting me
  2. Cutouts
